headline: 2025-10-29 — The European Broadcasting Union (EBU) published research showing leading AI assistants misrepresent news content in nearly 50% (≈50%) of their responses (research report).

2025-10-30 — Microsoft announced it will retain a stake valued at about $135 billion, representing roughly 27% of OpenAI Group PBC after control moves to the OpenAI Foundation (financial stake in USD and percent).
2025-10-27 — Reuters (Thomson Reuters) reaffirmed its position as the world’s largest multimedia news provider, reaching 'billions' of people every day (audience reach measured as people/day).

2025-10-28 — Bloomberg Intelligence (Mandeep Singh and Robert Biggar) published an industry analysis on the shift in AI toward inference workloads (1 Bloomberg Intelligence report published on the Bloomberg Terminal).
